column5: OK, Not much going on a holiday Monday. Was looking up info on the new Minn Kota I Pilot. Lots of hype but not much FIRST HAND INFO!  Any one have anything to say?? Yeah, I know it does WONDERFUL things but does it DO what they say??  FT

I was all hot to buy one until I found out the connector on my Powerdrive 50 uses the older style flat connector and the iPilot only can connect to the newer round connectors. I don't know the wiring schematic so I'm not sure I could splice something. I'd hate to hack a new piece of gear....
